com.impetus.serviceplatform.web.multiTenancy

Class MultiTenantConnectionProviderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impetus.serviceplatform.web.multiTenancy.MultiTenantConnectionProviderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.connections.spi.MultiTenantConnectionProvider, org.hibernate.service.Service, org.hibernate.service.spi.Stoppable, org.hibernate.service.spi.Wrapped

    public class MultiTenantConnectionProviderImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.connections.spi.MultiTenantConnectionProvider, org.hibernate.service.spi.Stoppable
    Simplisitc implementation for illustration purposes showing a single connection pool used to serve multiple schemas using "connection altering".
    See Also:
